ygData.subject: Re: Begging taunt
ygData.msgSnippet: That was how I noticed it.   My 10th bard happened to be between the caster and the orc and the orc attacked her first.  By the way I only use healing song
ygData.messageBody:
That was how I noticed it. My 10th bard happened to be between the caster
and the orc and the orc attacked her first. By the way I only use healing
song mainly to supplement what the clerics at this level can do. It is much
more efficient to slowly heal all those during a break and let the cleric
worry about it during combat.

I know that my 16th cleric loves it when a bard is also in the party since
she can do a better job of conserving mana until it is really needed.

Yilari
16th Cleric of Tunare, Erollisi Marr
